lead_paragraph: Coach Steve Alford's best recruiting class for this season was expected to get UCLA back on track following the Bruins' fourth losing season since 1948.

headline.print_headline: No. 2 UCLA Enters Pac-12 Season Undefeated
headline.main: No. 2 UCLA Enters Pac-12 Season Undefeated
